name: Goo
description: Goo, not to be confused with Afgoo, is an 80% indica strain that mixes a sweet-tasting Blueberry with the hashy, resinous Hindu Kush. Deep physical relaxation is coupled with slight cerebral energy, delivered alongside a fruity, blueberry flavor with earthy and sour notes. You may begin to feel pangs of hunger settle in with this indica, making it a suitable medicine for those needing appetite boost. Patients treating insomnia, pain, and muscle spasms may also find relief in the heavy, sedating effects Goo has to offer. Cultivators should harvest Goo after a 7 to 8 week flowering time indoors or in early October for outdoor gardens.
descriptionPlain: Goo, not to be confused with Afgoo, is an 80% indica strain that mixes a sweet-tasting Blueberry with the hashy, resinous Hindu Kush. Deep physical relaxation is coupled with slight cerebral energy, delivered alongside a fruity, blueberry flavor with earthy and sour notes. You may begin to feel pangs of hunger settle in with this indica, making it a suitable medicine for those needing appetite boost. Patients treating insomnia, pain, and muscle spasms may also find relief in the heavy, sedating effects Goo has to offer. Cultivators should harvest Goo after a 7 to 8 week flowering time indoors or in early October for outdoor gardens.

highlightedReviews.text: Vaporized goo that I purchased at Encanto Green Cross worked great for my lower back pain. highly recommend for relaxing before bed.
Great strain to cut stress away and help you relax.

articles.title: Bizarre Cannabis Strains With Unusual Growth Characteristics
articles.author: Trevor Hennings
articles.text:
Like all plants, cannabis comes in all shapes and sizes. Generally speaking, strains will exhibit differences in resin production, coloration, stature, and shape. Other times, cannabis will express itself with features you‚Äôve probably never seen firsthand. Below are five of the most unique and unusual genetic traits found in cannabis plants from all around the world. Whether by genetic mutation, environment, or factors unknown, these cannabis oddities are sure to stand out in any cannabis garden.
Albino Cannabis





 Couldn't resist posting another picture of this beauty showing one of the two tone buds.  This is one of our more unique plants in the outdoor garden, this plant is displaying variegation characteristics.  This anomaly occurs when the genes controlling the production of chlorophyll are not expressed correctly resulting in albino characteristics. There will be a very limited supply of this & we'll let you know which retailer will be carrying it.  #albinocannabis #whitecannabis #wanorml #norml #normllife #womengrow #fineweed #wafinestcannabis #marijuana #modernfarmer #mjfarm #pesticidefree #legalmarijuana #legalmj #i502 #cannabis #peaceloveandcannabis
A post shared by  Washington's Finest Cannabis (@washingtons_finest_cannabis) on Oct 2, 2015 at 7:01pm PDT



Albinism is a rare genetic mutation that occurs in humans, animals, and plants such as cannabis. An albino plant is one that grows with the complete or partial absence of chlorophyll pigmentation, causing the plant to appear lighter or white in color. The plants must contain some chlorophyll to perform photosynthesis (the process by which plants covert light energy into food), so albino plants may never make it to maturity before dying.

Dr. Grinspoon





 #420Magazine #Marijuana #DrGrinspoon #its420somewhere
A post shared by  420 Magazine (@420magazine) on May 6, 2015 at 12:19pm PDT



The spindly strain called Dr. Grinspoon¬†was dedicated to the longtime cannabis advocate and professor at Harvard, Dr. Lester Grinspoon. In the early 60s, Dr. Grinspoon condemned the use of cannabis as its popularity grew, but came to endorse it after studying the plant. He found that the information that was being shared to the public was not supported by his research and felt that the public was being strongly misled.
This strain is a pure sativa heirloom that typically invites creativity, energy, and cerebral activity. Bred by Barneys Farm in Amsterdam, it grows with a bizarre stature: Instead of developing bud sites at the nodes of the branches, Dr. Grinspoon grows small buds that decorate the plant like berries on a holly plant. Because of its unconventional appearance, this¬†strain is also a solid choice for growers seeking subtlety in their garden.
Dr. Grinspoon is not a high yielding strain and has a 14-week flowering period, making it an unpopular strain among commercial growers. But novelty-seeking cultivators raising this potent sativa will be rewarded with a truly unique product.
Polyploid Cannabis





 More shots of the weird mohawk bud üëΩüëæ phenotype‚Äã. #mohawk #phenohunters #macro #santacruz #scfarms #pistils #calyx #trichomes #faded #polyploid #flowers #alien
A post shared by  Santa Cruz Farms LLC (@scfarms) on Mar 5, 2017 at 1:44pm PST



Polyploidy occurs in plants that contain more than two sets of chromosomes in their genetic makeup. While most cannabis plants are simply diploid (two sets of chromosomes), many growers find that polyploid cannabis plants produce larger flowers with resilience to disease and pests. While this mutation in animals is often destructive, it is generally successful in plants. Many flowering plants have picked up extra chromosomes, and this mutation has often helped them become adaptive and resilient.
Buddha Seeds from Spain has been exploring polyploidy for a number of years now with the goal of producing more potent, high-yielding strains. The mutation is difficult to work with and difficult to clone, making polyploid cannabis plants few and far between.

Frisian Duck¬†





 Frisian Duck! http://tinyurl.com/Buyduckseeds #dutchpassion #dutchpassion #outdoorweedisthebest #harvesttime #frisianduckfoot #frisianduck #frisianduckfoot #frisianduckseeds #dutchpassion
A post shared by  Dutch Passion (@dutchpassionseedcompany) on Sep 8, 2015 at 12:21pm PDT



Frisian Duck, a cross between¬†Frisian Dew and Ducksfoot, was bred by Dutch Passion out of Amsterdam. While Frisian Dew was produced as a high-yielding outdoor strain, ‚ÄúDucksfoot‚Äù is a unique mutation that results in oddly shaped cannabis leaves. This cross holds on to the Ducksfoot leaf pattern while producing beautiful deep purple buds that are compact with spicy notes of citrus and pine.
A targeted benefit of Frisian Duck is stealth. With leaves that look nothing like a normal cannabis plant, Frisian Duck became a great strain for growers seeking to raise cannabis incognito.
Black Haze





 Black Haze ‚òÅ üî• #blackhaze #exoticstrain #gumdrop #shimmerandshine #dank #gas #cannabis #marijuana #herb #herblife #420 #hippylife #medicinal #legalizeit
A post shared by  Kush Dreamz (@kush_dreamin_420) on Dec 27, 2017 at 7:37pm PST



It‚Äôs not unusual to see vibrant or dark shades of purple in cannabis, but some strains achieve hues so distinct, you‚Äôll likely never forget them.¬†Black Haze is one of those strains, and as the name suggests, it oftentimes produces flowers that are near-black in color. Produced by Exotic Seed in Europe, this strain is an autoflowering variety that crosses Sir Jack x Skunk Auto and Pakistani Chitral Kush.
Other strains that sometimes express unusually dark hues include Black Lemon, Black Domina, Black Dahlia, and Black Diesel. Cannabis may also uniquely express blue, pink, and red coloration.

Pinkman Goo





 Interview about my exclusive " Pinkman Goo " 3way hybrid ( GDPXGrape Ape ) x northern lights 5 by @merryjane see more about plant guttation at its finest,  subscribe youtube.com/CaliCropDoc for video updates
A post shared by  CaliCropDoc ‚Äì Grower Education (@calicropdoc_) on Mar 10, 2016 at 4:10pm PST



Pinkman Goo is a strain developed by Twompson Prater of Cali Crop Doc. Discovered while growing a few unidentified seeds found by his sister, Pinkman Goo was named after observing little balls of goo secreted by the buds 3-4 weeks into flowering. It‚Äôs up for debate how the goo balls are created, but one theory hypothesizes that they result from nighttime ‚Äúrespiration‚Äù after the plant‚Äôs stomata close.
Have you come across any unusual cannabis strains? Tell us about them, or better yet, post a photo of them in the comments section below.

articles.title: The 13 Best Cannabis Strains for Parties
articles.author: Brett Konen
articles.text:
A lot of people think of alcohol as the classic social lubricant. For some of us, it is. Alcohol can loosen us up, make us chatty and animated, and wash away social anxiety. It‚Äôs also often readily available at social occasions. Meanwhile, many people avoid cannabis use during social events‚Äîfor one thing, it‚Äôs generally not served, and for another, many can recall a time cannabis made them paranoid or sleepy at a party, and don‚Äôt want to have that happen again.

Luckily, with the right strains you can avoid the unwanted effects mentioned above. We used the advanced filters in Leafly‚Äôs strain explorer to get started, sorting to include strains with the happiest, most talkative highs, and to exclude any strains that make users anxious, paranoid, or sleepy. (If only alcohol‚Äôs drawbacks were so easy to filter out, am I right?)
We‚Äôve curated the resultant list with our in-house expertise, vetting all suggestions against our own experiences and ensuring there‚Äôs a pick for every type of party. Attendees heading to any social occasion will find something below.
And the awards for the best party cannabis strains go to‚Ä¶
Chocolope
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: All occasions.
DNA Genetics developed Chocolope by crossing¬†Chocolate Thai¬†with¬†Cannalope Haze to create their homage to the super-popular Chocolate strains of the 1980s. The hefty¬†sativa¬†buds give¬†earthy, sweet¬†coffee¬†flavors that provide a dreamy, cerebral effect. It‚Äôs known around the Leafly office as ‚Äúthe party strain,‚Äù and for good reason‚Äîit‚Äôs basically impossible to be unhappy or introverted with such a feel-good high.

White Russian
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Dinner parties.
Originally created by Dutch breeders Serious Seeds, White Russian is a cross of two legendary strains,¬†White Widow¬†and¬†AK-47. An indica-dominant hybrid, it won the¬†High Times¬†Cannabis Cup ‚ÄúBest Overall‚Äù¬†in 1996. White Russian is an extremely fragrant plant, and with a flavor that is smooth and spicy with undertones of skunk and earth, and its high is quite cerebral (especially for an indica-dominant strain), making it great for conversation with those around you.
Tangie
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Cocktail parties.
Another fave among the Leafly crew, particularly for group gatherings after work, Tangie is a fantastic offering from DNA Genetics in Amsterdam. This strain is a remake of sorts of the popular version of¬†Tangerine Dream¬†that was sought-after in the 1990s, with genetics derived from a cross of¬†California Orange¬†and a¬†Skunk¬†hybrid. Its citrus heritage is the most evident in its refreshing tangerine aroma.
Blue Goo
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Friends and family gatherings.
Blue Goo is a sativa-dominant hybrid that‚Äôs a cross between the famous hybrid¬†Blue Dream¬†and indica¬†Afgoo. A moderate to high potency yields uplifting effects that are standard for sativas, but not excessively energetic thanks to Afgoo‚Äôs contribution as well as the mellow nature of Blue Dream. This strain is appropriate for day or nighttime consumption and provides smooth smoke and berry flavor.

Sour Lemon OG
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Birthday parties.
Bred by Emerald Triangle Seeds, Sour Lemon OG is a sativa-dominant¬†hybrid¬†cross between¬†California Sour¬†and¬†Lemon OG. This 65%¬†sativa¬†strain is named after its aromatic sour smell with recognizable notes of¬†lemon,¬†lime, and¬†apple. Sour Lemon OG elevates the mind and body simultaneously, making this a natural go-to strain for¬†celebrations, social engagements, or even just a busy day.
Blue Diesel
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Happy hour.
Daughter of indica-dominant¬†Blueberry¬†and sativa-dominant¬†NYC Diesel, Blue Diesel (also known as Blue City Diesel) falls slightly on the indica side of things with a pleasant,¬†moderate- to long-lasting body buzz (perfect if you want to extend the happy for more than an hour). Thanks to its Blueberry genetics, this flower emanates a light berry aroma that is smooth, expansive, and fast-acting. This strain is optimal for daytime use, and relaxes the consumer in social settings without putting you to sleep.
Pez
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Cannabis-focused parties.
Pez is an¬†indica¬†daughter of¬†Afghani¬†and Pakistani strains. These¬†sweet, frosty buds offer the¬†relaxation¬†typical of indicas without the drowsiness, making the strain great for daytime use.¬†We recommend this one as a shareable contribution to any 420-friendly gathering‚Äîit‚Äôs also on our list of the Top 100 Must-Try Strains, meaning it will be a particularly popular addition to any event with open cannabis consumption.

Orange Bud
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Hosting.
Matching plenty of social energy with a dose of subtle relaxation, this strain is perfect for gatherings where you‚Äôre in charge and want to stay upbeat and level-headed. First bred in 1980s by Dutch Passion, Orange Bud is a combination of two members of the 100%¬†Skunk¬†family. With bright orange hairs coating the surface, it showcases scents of orange and nectarine.
Blueberry Headband
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Parties you don‚Äôt want to attend.
Several renditions of the Blueberry Headband hybrid are known to exist, but the original Blueberry Headband from NorCal‚Äôs Emerald Triangle Seeds is the most well-known. It‚Äôs a 50/50 indica-sativa hybrid that smells of diesel, berries and pepper, and it produces a perfectly balanced high with a nice cerebral rush and relaxing body effects. This is great for staying sufficiently present while mentally floating high above any social event you wish you didn‚Äôt have to attend (think work parties, baby showers, and so on).
Banana Kush
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Potlucks.
This legendary West Coast strain crosses¬†Ghost OG¬†and¬†Skunk Haze¬†to create an¬†indica-dominant¬†hybrid¬†that tastes and smells like a bushel of fresh¬†bananas (and will whet your appetite if there‚Äôs food around). Although it leans towards an¬†indica genetically, the effects are balanced by the¬†Haze‚Äôs¬†mellow¬†sativa¬†buzz that provides a¬†relaxed¬†sense of¬†euphoria.¬†Banana Kush also help its consumers remain¬†talkative¬†in social settings.

Durban Cookies
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Loud parties.
Durban Cookies is the¬†Durban Poison-dominant¬†phenotype¬†of¬†GSC. Known for its invigorating mental energy and body buzz, Durban Cookies offers a more energizing experience, making this sativa-dominant strain a top choice throughout the day and into the evening, particularly if you‚Äôre headed to a high-energy event where you‚Äôll be surrounded by music, people, and movement.
Bubblegum Kush
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Low-key get-togethers.
This strain is for laid-back social situations; it‚Äôll leave you relaxed and comfy on any given couch, but also chatty and ready to hang with whoever sits down next to you. An 80% indica strain from Bulldog Seeds in the Netherlands, Bubblegum Kush is a cross between¬†Bubble Gum¬†and an undisclosed Kush, and has a satisfyingly sour smell and flavor.
Strawberry
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Being a plus-one.
Originally bred in the Netherlands, Strawberry is a mostly sativa cannabis strain with a pungent fruity scent and uplifting effects. Consumers prone to anxiety choose Strawberry for its stress-relieving qualities without the jarring paranoia common among high-THC strains (which makes it great for small talk with people you don‚Äôt know). Comfortable and relaxing, Strawberry brings with it a hearty dose of physical and mental ease.

This legendary West Coast strain crosses¬†Ghost OG¬†and¬†Skunk Haze¬†to create an¬†indica-dominant¬†hybrid¬†that tastes and smells like a bushel of fresh¬†bananas (and will whet your appetite if there‚Äôs food around). Although it leans towards an¬†indica genetically, the effects are balanced by the¬†Haze‚Äôs¬†mellow¬†sativa¬†buzz that provides a¬†relaxed¬†sense of¬†euphoria.¬†Banana Kush also help its consumers remain¬†talkative¬†in social settings.

Durban Cookies
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Loud parties.
Durban Cookies is the¬†Durban Poison-dominant¬†phenotype¬†of¬†GSC. Known for its invigorating mental energy and body buzz, Durban Cookies offers a more energizing experience, making this sativa-dominant strain a top choice throughout the day and into the evening, particularly if you‚Äôre headed to a high-energy event where you‚Äôll be surrounded by music, people, and movement.
Bubblegum Kush
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Low-key get-togethers.
This strain is for laid-back social situations; it‚Äôll leave you relaxed and comfy on any given couch, but also chatty and ready to hang with whoever sits down next to you. An 80% indica strain from Bulldog Seeds in the Netherlands, Bubblegum Kush is a cross between¬†Bubble Gum¬†and an undisclosed Kush, and has a satisfyingly sour smell and flavor.
Strawberry
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Being a plus-one.
Originally bred in the Netherlands, Strawberry is a mostly sativa cannabis strain with a pungent fruity scent and uplifting effects. Consumers prone to anxiety choose Strawberry for its stress-relieving qualities without the jarring paranoia common among high-THC strains (which makes it great for small talk with people you don‚Äôt know). Comfortable and relaxing, Strawberry brings with it a hearty dose of physical and mental ease.

name: Goo
description: Goo, not to be confused with Afgoo, is an 80% indica strain that mixes a sweet-tasting Blueberry with the hashy, resinous Hindu Kush. Deep physical relaxation is coupled with slight cerebral energy, delivered alongside a fruity, blueberry flavor with earthy and sour notes. You may begin to feel pangs of hunger settle in with this indica, making it a suitable medicine for those needing appetite boost. Patients treating insomnia, pain, and muscle spasms may also find relief in the heavy, sedating effects Goo has to offer. Cultivators should harvest Goo after a 7 to 8 week flowering time indoors or in early October for outdoor gardens.
descriptionPlain: Goo, not to be confused with Afgoo, is an 80% indica strain that mixes a sweet-tasting Blueberry with the hashy, resinous Hindu Kush. Deep physical relaxation is coupled with slight cerebral energy, delivered alongside a fruity, blueberry flavor with earthy and sour notes. You may begin to feel pangs of hunger settle in with this indica, making it a suitable medicine for those needing appetite boost. Patients treating insomnia, pain, and muscle spasms may also find relief in the heavy, sedating effects Goo has to offer. Cultivators should harvest Goo after a 7 to 8 week flowering time indoors or in early October for outdoor gardens.

highlightedReviews.text: Vaporized goo that I purchased at Encanto Green Cross worked great for my lower back pain. highly recommend for relaxing before bed.
Great strain to cut stress away and help you relax.

articles.title: Bizarre Cannabis Strains With Unusual Growth Characteristics
articles.author: Trevor Hennings
articles.text:
Like all plants, cannabis comes in all shapes and sizes. Generally speaking, strains will exhibit differences in resin production, coloration, stature, and shape. Other times, cannabis will express itself with features you‚Äôve probably never seen firsthand. Below are five of the most unique and unusual genetic traits found in cannabis plants from all around the world. Whether by genetic mutation, environment, or factors unknown, these cannabis oddities are sure to stand out in any cannabis garden.
Albino Cannabis





 Couldn't resist posting another picture of this beauty showing one of the two tone buds.  This is one of our more unique plants in the outdoor garden, this plant is displaying variegation characteristics.  This anomaly occurs when the genes controlling the production of chlorophyll are not expressed correctly resulting in albino characteristics. There will be a very limited supply of this & we'll let you know which retailer will be carrying it.  #albinocannabis #whitecannabis #wanorml #norml #normllife #womengrow #fineweed #wafinestcannabis #marijuana #modernfarmer #mjfarm #pesticidefree #legalmarijuana #legalmj #i502 #cannabis #peaceloveandcannabis
A post shared by  Washington's Finest Cannabis (@washingtons_finest_cannabis) on Oct 2, 2015 at 7:01pm PDT



Albinism is a rare genetic mutation that occurs in humans, animals, and plants such as cannabis. An albino plant is one that grows with the complete or partial absence of chlorophyll pigmentation, causing the plant to appear lighter or white in color. The plants must contain some chlorophyll to perform photosynthesis (the process by which plants covert light energy into food), so albino plants may never make it to maturity before dying.

Dr. Grinspoon





 #420Magazine #Marijuana #DrGrinspoon #its420somewhere
A post shared by  420 Magazine (@420magazine) on May 6, 2015 at 12:19pm PDT



The spindly strain called Dr. Grinspoon¬†was dedicated to the longtime cannabis advocate and professor at Harvard, Dr. Lester Grinspoon. In the early 60s, Dr. Grinspoon condemned the use of cannabis as its popularity grew, but came to endorse it after studying the plant. He found that the information that was being shared to the public was not supported by his research and felt that the public was being strongly misled.
This strain is a pure sativa heirloom that typically invites creativity, energy, and cerebral activity. Bred by Barneys Farm in Amsterdam, it grows with a bizarre stature: Instead of developing bud sites at the nodes of the branches, Dr. Grinspoon grows small buds that decorate the plant like berries on a holly plant. Because of its unconventional appearance, this¬†strain is also a solid choice for growers seeking subtlety in their garden.
Dr. Grinspoon is not a high yielding strain and has a 14-week flowering period, making it an unpopular strain among commercial growers. But novelty-seeking cultivators raising this potent sativa will be rewarded with a truly unique product.
Polyploid Cannabis





 More shots of the weird mohawk bud üëΩüëæ phenotype‚Äã. #mohawk #phenohunters #macro #santacruz #scfarms #pistils #calyx #trichomes #faded #polyploid #flowers #alien
A post shared by  Santa Cruz Farms LLC (@scfarms) on Mar 5, 2017 at 1:44pm PST



Polyploidy occurs in plants that contain more than two sets of chromosomes in their genetic makeup. While most cannabis plants are simply diploid (two sets of chromosomes), many growers find that polyploid cannabis plants produce larger flowers with resilience to disease and pests. While this mutation in animals is often destructive, it is generally successful in plants. Many flowering plants have picked up extra chromosomes, and this mutation has often helped them become adaptive and resilient.
Buddha Seeds from Spain has been exploring polyploidy for a number of years now with the goal of producing more potent, high-yielding strains. The mutation is difficult to work with and difficult to clone, making polyploid cannabis plants few and far between.

Frisian Duck¬†





 Frisian Duck! http://tinyurl.com/Buyduckseeds #dutchpassion #dutchpassion #outdoorweedisthebest #harvesttime #frisianduckfoot #frisianduck #frisianduckfoot #frisianduckseeds #dutchpassion
A post shared by  Dutch Passion (@dutchpassionseedcompany) on Sep 8, 2015 at 12:21pm PDT



Frisian Duck, a cross between¬†Frisian Dew and Ducksfoot, was bred by Dutch Passion out of Amsterdam. While Frisian Dew was produced as a high-yielding outdoor strain, ‚ÄúDucksfoot‚Äù is a unique mutation that results in oddly shaped cannabis leaves. This cross holds on to the Ducksfoot leaf pattern while producing beautiful deep purple buds that are compact with spicy notes of citrus and pine.
A targeted benefit of Frisian Duck is stealth. With leaves that look nothing like a normal cannabis plant, Frisian Duck became a great strain for growers seeking to raise cannabis incognito.
Black Haze





 Black Haze ‚òÅ üî• #blackhaze #exoticstrain #gumdrop #shimmerandshine #dank #gas #cannabis #marijuana #herb #herblife #420 #hippylife #medicinal #legalizeit
A post shared by  Kush Dreamz (@kush_dreamin_420) on Dec 27, 2017 at 7:37pm PST



It‚Äôs not unusual to see vibrant or dark shades of purple in cannabis, but some strains achieve hues so distinct, you‚Äôll likely never forget them.¬†Black Haze is one of those strains, and as the name suggests, it oftentimes produces flowers that are near-black in color. Produced by Exotic Seed in Europe, this strain is an autoflowering variety that crosses Sir Jack x Skunk Auto and Pakistani Chitral Kush.
Other strains that sometimes express unusually dark hues include Black Lemon, Black Domina, Black Dahlia, and Black Diesel. Cannabis may also uniquely express blue, pink, and red coloration.

Pinkman Goo





 Interview about my exclusive " Pinkman Goo " 3way hybrid ( GDPXGrape Ape ) x northern lights 5 by @merryjane see more about plant guttation at its finest,  subscribe youtube.com/CaliCropDoc for video updates
A post shared by  CaliCropDoc ‚Äì Grower Education (@calicropdoc_) on Mar 10, 2016 at 4:10pm PST



Pinkman Goo is a strain developed by Twompson Prater of Cali Crop Doc. Discovered while growing a few unidentified seeds found by his sister, Pinkman Goo was named after observing little balls of goo secreted by the buds 3-4 weeks into flowering. It‚Äôs up for debate how the goo balls are created, but one theory hypothesizes that they result from nighttime ‚Äúrespiration‚Äù after the plant‚Äôs stomata close.
Have you come across any unusual cannabis strains? Tell us about them, or better yet, post a photo of them in the comments section below.

articles.title: The 13 Best Cannabis Strains for Parties
articles.author: Brett Konen
articles.text:
A lot of people think of alcohol as the classic social lubricant. For some of us, it is. Alcohol can loosen us up, make us chatty and animated, and wash away social anxiety. It‚Äôs also often readily available at social occasions. Meanwhile, many people avoid cannabis use during social events‚Äîfor one thing, it‚Äôs generally not served, and for another, many can recall a time cannabis made them paranoid or sleepy at a party, and don‚Äôt want to have that happen again.

Luckily, with the right strains you can avoid the unwanted effects mentioned above. We used the advanced filters in Leafly‚Äôs strain explorer to get started, sorting to include strains with the happiest, most talkative highs, and to exclude any strains that make users anxious, paranoid, or sleepy. (If only alcohol‚Äôs drawbacks were so easy to filter out, am I right?)
We‚Äôve curated the resultant list with our in-house expertise, vetting all suggestions against our own experiences and ensuring there‚Äôs a pick for every type of party. Attendees heading to any social occasion will find something below.
And the awards for the best party cannabis strains go to‚Ä¶
Chocolope
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: All occasions.
DNA Genetics developed Chocolope by crossing¬†Chocolate Thai¬†with¬†Cannalope Haze to create their homage to the super-popular Chocolate strains of the 1980s. The hefty¬†sativa¬†buds give¬†earthy, sweet¬†coffee¬†flavors that provide a dreamy, cerebral effect. It‚Äôs known around the Leafly office as ‚Äúthe party strain,‚Äù and for good reason‚Äîit‚Äôs basically impossible to be unhappy or introverted with such a feel-good high.

White Russian
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Dinner parties.
Originally created by Dutch breeders Serious Seeds, White Russian is a cross of two legendary strains,¬†White Widow¬†and¬†AK-47. An indica-dominant hybrid, it won the¬†High Times¬†Cannabis Cup ‚ÄúBest Overall‚Äù¬†in 1996. White Russian is an extremely fragrant plant, and with a flavor that is smooth and spicy with undertones of skunk and earth, and its high is quite cerebral (especially for an indica-dominant strain), making it great for conversation with those around you.
Tangie
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Cocktail parties.
Another fave among the Leafly crew, particularly for group gatherings after work, Tangie is a fantastic offering from DNA Genetics in Amsterdam. This strain is a remake of sorts of the popular version of¬†Tangerine Dream¬†that was sought-after in the 1990s, with genetics derived from a cross of¬†California Orange¬†and a¬†Skunk¬†hybrid. Its citrus heritage is the most evident in its refreshing tangerine aroma.
Blue Goo
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Friends and family gatherings.
Blue Goo is a sativa-dominant hybrid that‚Äôs a cross between the famous hybrid¬†Blue Dream¬†and indica¬†Afgoo. A moderate to high potency yields uplifting effects that are standard for sativas, but not excessively energetic thanks to Afgoo‚Äôs contribution as well as the mellow nature of Blue Dream. This strain is appropriate for day or nighttime consumption and provides smooth smoke and berry flavor.

Sour Lemon OG
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Birthday parties.
Bred by Emerald Triangle Seeds, Sour Lemon OG is a sativa-dominant¬†hybrid¬†cross between¬†California Sour¬†and¬†Lemon OG. This 65%¬†sativa¬†strain is named after its aromatic sour smell with recognizable notes of¬†lemon,¬†lime, and¬†apple. Sour Lemon OG elevates the mind and body simultaneously, making this a natural go-to strain for¬†celebrations, social engagements, or even just a busy day.
Blue Diesel
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Happy hour.
Daughter of indica-dominant¬†Blueberry¬†and sativa-dominant¬†NYC Diesel, Blue Diesel (also known as Blue City Diesel) falls slightly on the indica side of things with a pleasant,¬†moderate- to long-lasting body buzz (perfect if you want to extend the happy for more than an hour). Thanks to its Blueberry genetics, this flower emanates a light berry aroma that is smooth, expansive, and fast-acting. This strain is optimal for daytime use, and relaxes the consumer in social settings without putting you to sleep.
Pez
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Cannabis-focused parties.
Pez is an¬†indica¬†daughter of¬†Afghani¬†and Pakistani strains. These¬†sweet, frosty buds offer the¬†relaxation¬†typical of indicas without the drowsiness, making the strain great for daytime use.¬†We recommend this one as a shareable contribution to any 420-friendly gathering‚Äîit‚Äôs also on our list of the Top 100 Must-Try Strains, meaning it will be a particularly popular addition to any event with open cannabis consumption.

Orange Bud
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Hosting.
Matching plenty of social energy with a dose of subtle relaxation, this strain is perfect for gatherings where you‚Äôre in charge and want to stay upbeat and level-headed. First bred in 1980s by Dutch Passion, Orange Bud is a combination of two members of the 100%¬†Skunk¬†family. With bright orange hairs coating the surface, it showcases scents of orange and nectarine.
Blueberry Headband
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Parties you don‚Äôt want to attend.
Several renditions of the Blueberry Headband hybrid are known to exist, but the original Blueberry Headband from NorCal‚Äôs Emerald Triangle Seeds is the most well-known. It‚Äôs a 50/50 indica-sativa hybrid that smells of diesel, berries and pepper, and it produces a perfectly balanced high with a nice cerebral rush and relaxing body effects. This is great for staying sufficiently present while mentally floating high above any social event you wish you didn‚Äôt have to attend (think work parties, baby showers, and so on).
Banana Kush
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Potlucks.
This legendary West Coast strain crosses¬†Ghost OG¬†and¬†Skunk Haze¬†to create an¬†indica-dominant¬†hybrid¬†that tastes and smells like a bushel of fresh¬†bananas (and will whet your appetite if there‚Äôs food around). Although it leans towards an¬†indica genetically, the effects are balanced by the¬†Haze‚Äôs¬†mellow¬†sativa¬†buzz that provides a¬†relaxed¬†sense of¬†euphoria.¬†Banana Kush also help its consumers remain¬†talkative¬†in social settings.

Durban Cookies
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Loud parties.
Durban Cookies is the¬†Durban Poison-dominant¬†phenotype¬†of¬†GSC. Known for its invigorating mental energy and body buzz, Durban Cookies offers a more energizing experience, making this sativa-dominant strain a top choice throughout the day and into the evening, particularly if you‚Äôre headed to a high-energy event where you‚Äôll be surrounded by music, people, and movement.
Bubblegum Kush
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Low-key get-togethers.
This strain is for laid-back social situations; it‚Äôll leave you relaxed and comfy on any given couch, but also chatty and ready to hang with whoever sits down next to you. An 80% indica strain from Bulldog Seeds in the Netherlands, Bubblegum Kush is a cross between¬†Bubble Gum¬†and an undisclosed Kush, and has a satisfyingly sour smell and flavor.
Strawberry
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Being a plus-one.
Originally bred in the Netherlands, Strawberry is a mostly sativa cannabis strain with a pungent fruity scent and uplifting effects. Consumers prone to anxiety choose Strawberry for its stress-relieving qualities without the jarring paranoia common among high-THC strains (which makes it great for small talk with people you don‚Äôt know). Comfortable and relaxing, Strawberry brings with it a hearty dose of physical and mental ease.
